bioconda.name: bioconductor-chippeakanno
bioconda.summary: Batch annotation of the peaks identified from either ChIP-seq, ChIP-chip experiments, or any experiments that result in large number of genomic interval data

biotools.summary: The package includes functions to retrieve the sequences around the peak, obtain enriched GO terms, find the nearest gene, exon, miRNA or custom features such as most conserved elements and other TF binding sites supplied by users. New functions have been added for finding the peaks with bi-directional promoters with summary statistics, for summarizing the occurrence of motifs in peaks and for adding other IDs to annotated peaks or enrichedGO.
